title: The Sheriff of Shard Hills
description: As a half-human, half-dimeti hybrid, Varuna Das is used to being treated poorly, despite being a cop. He even understands it. What he doesn’t understand is why Major Kerrick StarCourser, a young, beautiful war hero, keeps coming back to him for no-strings sexy fun. Kerrick’s made a career of fighting dimeti in creative ways, so his interest in Varuna has never made any sense. But this time, instead of a quick visit, Kerrick settles into Varuna’s new home in Shard Hills as though he was never a special forces officer.Confused as he is, Varuna loves having Kerrick there. His life as Shard Hills’s new sheriff is shaping up to be all he’s wanted: a home, a purpose, a family. But when his dark past catches up to him, will Kerrick’s heroic integrity let him forgive and forget…and stay?
author: Jenn Burke
